be.ac.umons.gui

Class AutomaticGameScreen<T extends AutomaticGame>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
      • be.ac.umons.gui.GameScreen<T>
        • be.ac.umons.gui.AutomaticGameScreen<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Game to be shown
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutomaticController.EndLevelListener, com.badlogic.gdx.Screen

    public class AutomaticGameScreen<T extends AutomaticGame>
extends GameScreen<T>
implements AutomaticController.EndLevelListener
    Screen used to show an automatic game

        libGDXGame - Game (LibGDX) used to switch between screens

        mode - The mode of the AutomaticGame
        backScreen - The screen used after exiting this screen
